item.title: Old Louisville Ghost Tour as Recommended by The New York Times @ 4th and Ormsby
item.description: Old Louisville is home to impressive Victorian mansions that trace back to wealthy families in the 1800s. On this walking tour, uncover the eerie past of the neighborhood alongside a guide who regales you with several ghostly tales. Stop at several points of interest including the Conrad-Caldwell House Museum, the Witches' Tree, and the Filson Historical Society.

image.alt: Old Louisville Ghost Tour as Recommended by The New York Times @ 4th and Ormsby

item.title: Kentucky Derby Museum General Admission Ticket
item.description: Discover the history and heritage of the Kentucky Derby with admission to the Kentucky Derby Museum at Churchill Downs Racetrack. Explore two levels of exhibits on a self-guided tour, then take a 30-minute, guided walking tour of the Churchill Down Racetrack.

image.alt: Kentucky Derby Museum General Admission Ticket

item.title: Old Louisville Walking Tour Recommended by The New York Times! @ 4th and Ormsby
item.description: Step back in time and discover the history of Louisville during an immersive walking tour through the historic center. Listen to stories of wealthy titans who used to roam the streets as you explore sights including St. James Court, Ormsby Avenue, Floral Terrace, and Millionaires Row. You also have the chance to admire the old Victorian architecture that dots the neighborhood.

image.alt: Old Louisville Walking Tour Recommended by The New York Times! @ 4th and Ormsby

item.title: Secrets of Louisville: Food & History Walking Tour in NuLu
item.description:
Explore vibrant NuLu and historic Butchertown and get to know the flavors of Louisville! Over the course of 3 immersive hours, you'll visit 6 local eateries and enjoy 8 delicious bites that showcase Louisville's culinary heritage. Dishes include biscuits & gravy with roots in the foothills of Appalachia, Kentucky-style fried chicken, a unique-to-Louisville BBQ dish, bourbon balls, and a Hot Brown gravy created during the glamour of the pre-Prohibition era.
You'll also enjoy tastings of barrel-aged craft beer and a refreshing alcoholic slushy featuring Kentucky's beloved Ale8 soda.
As you wander through the historic streets of two of Louisville's oldest neighborhoods, you’ll uncover the stories behind the city’s rich history, visit a historic home once occupied by Thomas Edison, sample a unique confection inspired by a Victorian actress, and trace the paths of the immigrants who shaped Louisville.
This tour typically sells out. Reserve your spot early and come hungry and curious!

image.alt: Secrets of Louisville: Food & History Walking Tour in NuLu

item.title: Prohibition Ghosts Cocktails and Bites Walking Tour in Louisville
item.description: Be transported back to Louisville during the Prohibition era and learn about the city’s haunted past as you discover speakeasies, a ghost-infested hotel, and other important landmarks. Stop for local bites at four venues and enjoy prohibition-era cocktails as well as a bourbon tasting while learning about prohibition history. End with a dessert and a cocktail with a view overlooking downtown Louisville.

image.alt: Prohibition Ghosts Cocktails and Bites Walking Tour in Louisville

item.title: Louisville: Walking Food & History Tour of the Historic Highlands
item.description: Get your bearings in Louisville and learn about two of the city’s most storied neighborhoods with this cultural and culinary stroll through the Original Highlands and Cherokee Triangle districts. Admire Victorian homes, contemporary street art, and vibrant shopping and dining scenes as you nibble and sip your way along the historic streets. Pass the final resting places of Mohammed Ali and Colonel Sanders, plus sample bourbon and local specialties.

image.alt: Louisville: Walking Food & History Tour of the Historic Highlands

item.title: Bourbon Distillery & Horse Farm Tours
item.description: Experience two of Kentucky’s top attractions—bourbon and horses—on this private all-day tour. You’ll work with your guide to choose the region you want to explore: Louisville, Lexington, or Bardstown. Then, he’ll recommend three significant distilleries in the area and arrange tours and tastings at each, leaving you to just have fun. On the day of the tour, you’ll be transported to each stop in a spacious vehicle, ensuring your safety and comfort. A stop for lunch and a horse farm visit is included if desired.

image.alt: Bourbon Distillery & Horse Farm Tours

item.title: Whispers on Whiskey Row: Murder, Crime, & Ghosts of Derby City
item.description:
Step into the past on a haunting journey through the true story of the "Graveyard of the West". As the sun sets and the city’s vibrant façade fades, you'll uncover the sinister secrets and chilling tales that lurk beneath the city's storied streets.
One part ghosts, one part grisly history, this guided 1.5-hour walking tour through downtown unveils the darkest corners of Louisville’s gruesome past, where the echoes of bygone eras whisper tragic tales of the forlorn, the oppressed, the betrayed, and the ruthless.
From a ghost that still haunts a glamorous hotel to the tragic riots of Bloody Monday, you’ll trace the cursed footsteps of criminals, mobsters, bootleggers, enslavers, and murderers in the city streets they once roamed – and the spirits whose souls never left.
For thrill-seekers, true crime fans, and lovers of the macabre, this dark history & ghost tour is a journey into the stories that lie beneath Louisville’s charming exterior. Dare to listen to the shadows with us.

image.alt: Whispers on Whiskey Row: Murder, Crime, & Ghosts of Derby City

item.title: Germantown Public Beer Walk
item.description: Get a taste of Louisville’s thriving beer on this small-group, half-day guided tour. Over the course of an afternoon, you’ll go at three different Louisville breweries and will enjoy numerous different beers. Enjou 8 oz beer tasting at each stop.

image.alt: Germantown Public Beer Walk

item.title: Louisville: 3-hour Walking Bourbon Food Tour with 10 Paired Bites
item.description:
Uncover the secrets of Kentucky bourbon! Go beyond the barrel to dive into bourbon's storied history - and learn all the stories they won't tell you on a Kentucky Bourbon Trail distillery tour.
Visit award-winning restaurants, secret speakeasies, scenic rooftop bars, and intimate tasting rooms in NuLu. Trace the origins of bourbon whiskey from its roots in the Appalachian foothills to today's thriving bourbon scene, gaining a profound understanding of its cultural importance in Louisville, Kentucky and beyond.
Unlock bourbon's surprising versatility and depth of flavor through paired bites, pours, and cocktails, and land a few coveted tables at some of the most hard-to-book restaurants in town, including Nami by local celebrity Chef Edward Lee.
Perfect for both bourbon newcomers and seasoned enthusiasts, this guided walking tour offers an experience that you won't find at any bourbon distillery. Reserve your spot early to experience the world's only walking food & bourbon tour!

image.alt: Louisville: 3-hour Walking Bourbon Food Tour with 10 Paired Bites

item.title: Bourbon Tour (03) : Buffalo Trace, Woodford, Four Roses, Wild Turkey, Other
item.description: Discover Kentucky's long bourbon-making history on a half-day tour. Choose three distilleries to visit from a list of over 15 and spend your day taking guided tours of the facilities. Learn about the production process of making bourbon as well as the tumultuous history of distilling during the Prohibition. You also get to sample several bourbons from each brand at the end of every tour.

image.alt: Bourbon Tour (03) : Buffalo Trace, Woodford, Four Roses, Wild Turkey, Other

item.title: 3-Hour Private Food & History Guided Walking Tour in Louisville
item.description: Choose one of three walking tours, depending on your interests, for a private food and history tour just for your group. Make sure to come hungry because you will be fed starters, mains, and desert, plus plenty of alcoholic drinks. Your guide makes sure you get the full food and drink experience in Louisville, and have a great night out.

image.alt: 3-Hour Private Food & History Guided Walking Tour in Louisville

item.title: Bourbon & Derby: Makers Mark OR Buffalo trace + Churchill Down
item.description: There’s nothing that better sums up Kentucky like bourbon and horse racing but main attractions around these subjects can be hard to get to. This Kentucky Bourbon Distillery and Churchill Downs Tour takes you to Maker’s Mark (or another popular distillery of your choice) to taste bourbon before you head over to Churchill Downs racing complex. You can also add another stop at a second distillery if requested ahead of time.

image.alt: Bourbon & Derby: Makers Mark OR Buffalo trace + Churchill Down

item.title: Groups: Makers Mark OR Buffalo Trace OR Woodford or Others
item.description: Maximize time in Kentucky with a full-day distillery tour. Get picked up at your hotel or the address of your choice in Louisville and skip the hassle of driving. Set out on a small-group tour to visit distilleries and learn about bourbon production. Choose from an extensive list including distilleries like Woodford Reserve, Wild Turkey, Four Roses, and more. Tours and tastings are included.

image.alt: Groups: Makers Mark OR Buffalo Trace OR Woodford or Others

item.title: Private Kentucky Single Barrel Tour- Chasing Blanton’s
item.description: Maximize time in Louisville, Kentucky with a private tour focused on tasting single barrel bourbons. Get picked up at the address of your choice in Louisville in a vehicle that can suit up to eight people. Set out on a full-day tour of bourbon country that includes hands-on learning opportunities from tastings to behind-the-scenes craft tours. Taste several single barrel bourbons, including Blanton’s.

image.alt: Private Kentucky Single Barrel Tour- Chasing Blanton’s

item.title: Full Day Bourbon Experience
item.description:
Full-Day Kentucky Bourbon Tour Embark on an unforgettable journey through the heart of bourbon country with SIP Tours. Our full-day Kentucky Bourbon Tour offers exclusive access to some of the most iconic distilleries in the region. Discover the rich history, craftsmanship, and flavors that make Kentucky bourbon world-renowned.
Scenic - Drives Throughout the day, enjoy the beautiful Kentucky countryside as we travel between distilleries. Our comfortable, luxurious transportation ensures a relaxing and enjoyable journey.
A guided tour of the distillery, showcasing the traditional bourbon-making process.
Tastings of award-winning bourbons. Stories of the distillery s commitment to preserving the authentic spirit of Kentucky bourbon
***Please note all distilleries on the itinerary are tentative. Distilleries listed cannot be guaranteed and are examples of a sample itinerary. All final distilleries are based on availability.

image.alt: Full Day Bourbon Experience

item.title: Pour Your Own Candle Making Experience with Blending & Education
item.description:
Bardstown is known for their BOURBON.—but we want to offer experiences that differ slightly and will be fun for the entire group. We take a slight jaunt off the Bourbon Trail and offer an opportunity to craft your own handmade candle as well as enjoy Kentucky Made Wines and Beers.
During your experience, you will be given a large variety of scents to choose from to blend into YOUR perfect scented candle. In addition, our large variety of candle vessels offer just the right finishing personalization for your aesthetics. As we embark on the candle making journey you will receive full education on how to label, wick, blend, make and pour your candle. Along the way we offer a variety of candle burning and safety tips that will make all future candle burning even more enjoyable. This will be the activity that everyone will be talking about when they go home.

image.alt: Pour Your Own Candle Making Experience with Blending & Education

item.title: Private Frankfort Bourbon Tour: Groups of 2-6 Buffalo Trace, More
item.description:
No shared buses! This is a private vehicle for you and your group.
On this full-day private Frankfort, KY, bourbon distillery tour, you will visit three separate distillery operations. On these stops, you'll learn information about making bourbon, while learning the history of some iconic brands.
For this tour, please select (5-6) distilleries from the list ranked in order of importance. From there, we will coordinate with you and book (3) distillery tours with tastings for your group. These will booked based on availability, scheduling, and your ranking at your approval.
By booking this tour, you'll receive:
Hassle-free booking A private vehicle for your group Free pickup from your Louisville hotel or AirBnb Base-level admission to 3 distilleries A knowledgable & friendly designated driver
Note, we will stop for lunch, but it is not included in this online price. Please send an email for questions. This trip will take about 8-10 hours in total.

image.alt: Private Frankfort Bourbon Tour: Groups of 2-6 Buffalo Trace, More

item.title: Private Barstown Bourbon Tour (Groups of 2-6) Maker's Mark & More
item.description:
No shared buses! This is a private vehicle for you and your group.
On this full-day private Bardstown KY, bourbon distillery tour, you will visit three separate distillery operations. On these stops, you'll learn information about making bourbon, while learning the history of some iconic brands.
For this tour, please select (5-6) distilleries from the list ranked in order of importance. From there, we will coordinate with you and book (3) distillery tours with tastings for your group. These will booked based on availability, scheduling, and your ranking and your approval.
By booking this tour, you'll receive:
- Hassle-free booking - A private vehicle for your group - Free pickup from your Louisville hotel or AirBnb - Base-level admission to 3 distilleries - A knowledgable & friendly designated driver
* Note, we will stop for lunch, but it is not included in this online price. Please send an email for questions. This tour will take about 8-9 hours in total.

image.alt: Private Barstown Bourbon Tour (Groups of 2-6) Maker's Mark & More

item.title: Full Day Private Bourbon Tour
item.description:
Explore the heart of Kentucky's rich bourbon heritage with SIP Tours on our exclusive private tour of the world-renowned Kentucky Bourbon. This personalized journey offers an immersive experience into the craftsmanship and history behind America's native spirit.
Tour Highlights:
Custom Itinerary: Tailored to your preferences, visit iconic distilleries such as Buffalo Trace, Woodford Reserve, Bulleit, and more. VIP Access: Enjoy exclusive tastings, behind-the-scenes tours, and meet master distillers who share their expertise and passion for bourbon making. Scenic Landscapes: Traverse picturesque Kentucky countryside known for its rolling hills and historic distillery architecture. Details: Embark on a memorable journey through Kentucky's Bourbon Country with SIP Tours, where every sip tells a story of tradition, craftsmanship, and Southern hospitality.

image.alt: Full Day Private Bourbon Tour

item.title: General Admission Ticket to Frazier History Museum
item.description: The Frazier History Museum is the top Kentucky history museum with iconic artifacts for people of all ages. This experience will bring you face to face with the most interesting and influential things in Kentucky's long history and establish what makes Kentucky so cool.

image.alt: General Admission Ticket to Frazier History Museum

item.title: Private Kentucky Bourbon Trail - The Outlaws and Inlaws Tour
item.description: Discover the essence of Kentucky's vibrant bourbon heritage with a personal "Sipping Director", on an exclusive private tour of the acclaimed Kentucky Bourbon Trail. This customized experience immerses you in the artistry and history behind America's signature spirit. Learn about Kentucky bourbon before heading to two to three distilleries for tours and tastings. A meal and round-trip transport from Louisville is also included.

image.alt: Private Kentucky Bourbon Trail - The Outlaws and Inlaws Tour

item.title: Buffalo Trace,Four Roses,Woodford,Bulleit Frontier/Stitzel, Castle&Key or Jeptha
item.description: Visit four of Louisville’s most famous bourbon distilleries--and stop for tours and tastings at two of them--with this customizable group tour. You can choose from a number of different distilleries, including the famous Bulleit Distilling Co Visitor Experience and the historic Buffalo Trace Distillery, with the option to add additional tastings to your tour on request.

image.alt: Buffalo Trace,Four Roses,Woodford,Bulleit Frontier/Stitzel, Castle&Key or Jeptha

item.title: Private Louisville Bourbon Tour (Groups of 2-6) Old-Fo & More
item.description:
No shared buses! This is a private vehicle for you and your group.
On this full-day private Louisville, KY, bourbon distillery tour, you will visit three separate distillery operations. On these stops, you'll learn information about making bourbon, while learning the history of some iconic brands.
For this tour, please select 5–6 distilleries from the list ranked in order of importance. From there, we will coordinate with you and book (3) distillery tours with tastings for your group. These will be booked based on availability, scheduling, ranking, and your final approval.
By booking this tour, you'll receive:
Hassle-free booking A private vehicle for your group Free pickup from your hotel or Airbnb Base-level admission to 3 distilleries A knowledgeable and friendly designated driver
* Note: We will stop for lunch, but it is not included in this online price.
This tour will take apx 9 hours in total. If time for another stop, we can add one at the group's expense.

image.alt: Private Louisville Bourbon Tour (Groups of 2-6) Old-Fo & More
